warning_id, warning_weather_type, warning_level, warning_head_line, warning_valid_from, warning_valid_to, warning_impact, warning_likelihood, warning_affected_areas, warning_what_to_expect, warning_further_details, warning_update_description, ST_AsGeoJSON(warning_area) as warning_area,
